588530.name: Derail Valley Demo
588530.description:
Driving trains is dynamic. Sorting rolling stock within a tight deadline is even more so! You must plan your route, switch junctions and move cars between trainyards, all while checking up a traffic schedule and racing through curves on the edge of derailment with calculated moves. There’s no time to lose, yet there's always something to do!

Derail Valley is a next-gen train simulation made for VR. Drive a train with your own hands - and keep that thing on the tracks!

Next-gen?



Derail Valley is still in pre-alpha phase and developed by a small three-people team. However, already in its current version it offers some key advancements to the genre:

  • Made for VR and motion controllers
  • Decayed railway simulation
  • Derailment physics
  • Fun and dynamic gameplay
  • Immersive audio and abandoned natural environment

We're planning various new features for the release, which will be showcased as they come. For now you can try the free demo. It comes with one multi-trainyard 4km² map and one fictional diesel-electric shunter locomotive.

Stay tuned for more news updates as we get closer to the release! In the meantime, if you have any questions, comments and feedback about the game please feel free to post on the Steam Community Forums!
588530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
